website_summaries.verdict: Through the decades, Sperry has launched a catalog of shoes that have aged gracefully. Among these are the Stripers, which became longtime favorites. From this time-tested silhouette sprang forth the Sperry Striper II LTT Suede, whose features impressed both new and jaded customers.The Sperry Striper II LTT Suede bears that simple laidback look that is timeless and delivers incredible comfort. This model, which the brand claimed to be at the top of its class, is offered at a budget-friendly price. Indeed, a wise deal to be considered.
pros: The Sperry Striper II LTT Suede mostly gathered five-star ratings and high recommendations from reviewers
The majority of buyers immediately loved this model’s simple, unassuming style, which looked almost conservative
Heaps of testers marveled at its superior out-of-the-box comfort
A couple highlighted that the insoles felt like clouds and pillows underneath their feet
More than a handful were enamored with the fine, soft suede upper and its neutral shades
This shoe runs true to size, as reported by most users
At least two customers shared the sentiment of the Sperry Striper II LTT Suede as being the best pair they’ve bought so far
A longtime Sperry customer said that the Striper II LTT Suede is his favorite among all Sperry shoes
A first-time Sperry user was amazed by this model and guaranteed to buy more Sperry shoes in the years to come
cons: At least one customer reported that the Sperry label on the heels began to peel off after a few weeks of wearing the sneakers
One wearer complained that the shoe squeaks when he walks in them

customer_reviews.title: Good reasonably priced shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I have had a similar blue canvas pair for a year. Only downside, having had to wear an AFO (ankle/ foot, orthopedic [sic] brace) for several months the two part sole, gum bottom/ and white rubber wrap around up the sides have separated, where the pair I had purchased prior that has a one piece version are doing fine. That said I bought 2 pairs of the canvas (one pair, victim to an act of dog) gum soles, and that the shorter wear life did not change my mind on buying them again in a blue faux suade.
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look good
customer_reviews.text: I love them. At first, I was worried because of some customer’s reviews, but I took my chance and bought them. No rejects about that decision. They’re comfortable, fit just right and look pretty good with jeans and pants.

product_meta.title: Sperry Top-Sider mens Sts19403
product_meta.description: Look on-point all season long with the sleek Sperry® Striper II LTT Suede sneaker. Soft suede upper. Traditional lace-up style with fabric laces and tonal eyelets for a secure fit. Vulcanized construction. Breathable textile lining for added comfort. Removable, full-length contoured footbed molds to your foot, creating a customized, supportive fit. Non-marking, ultra-lightweight outsole won't scuff your floors and provides long-lasting durability and flexibility. Sole features molded Wave-Siping™ design gives you excellent traction on wet and dry surfaces. Imported.
